title: Jcearnest93
author: Jcearnest93
content: I'm developing a new course for etoro. I need a few beta testers to try out my trading method on etoro. My requirements are you must be a citizen of the usa, atleasts 18 years old and have a bank account. I will provide the training and once you complete the training course, I will provide you a $100 deposit for etoro to try my method. You must also have to be to willing provide a testimonial and show your results as proof that you have made money from my method. I'm not asking for any money from you, so please don't give me any shit. Just come with an open mind, be able to follow the simple instructions I give you and be willing to work fast. So if you're interested. DM or add me on telegram - @cearnest93

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Jcearnest93 on July 02, 2022, 04:31:30 PMI'm developing a new course for etoro. I need a few beta testers to try out my trading method on etoro. My requirements are you must be a citizen of the usa, atleasts 18 years old and have a bank account. I will provide the training and once you complete the training course, I will provide you a $100 deposit for etoro to try my method. You must also have to be to willing provide a testimonial and show your results as proof that you have made money from my method. I'm not asking for any money from you, so please don't give me any shit. Just come with an open mind, be able to follow the simple instructions I give you and be willing to work fast. So if you're interested. DM or add me on telegram - @cearnest93If you give deposits on etoro then why you are asking for bank information? Will you do anything with bank accounts, or what you will do with the bank account? And also, why you trying to waste time of you by providing training instead of creating a video from where people will be able to know what should do for you?
